export var BAGGAGE_KEY_PAIR_SEPARATOR = '=';
export var BAGGAGE_PROPERTIES_SEPARATOR = ';';
export var BAGGAGE_ITEMS_SEPARATOR = ','; // Name of the http header used to propagate the baggage

export var BAGGAGE_HEADER = 'baggage'; // Maximum number of name-value pairs allowed by w3c spec

export var BAGGAGE_MAX_NAME_VALUE_PAIRS = 180; // Maximum number of bytes per a single name-value pair allowed by w3c spec

export var BAGGAGE_MAX_PER_NAME_VALUE_PAIRS = 4096; // Maximum total length of all name-value pairs allowed by w3c spec

export var BAGGAGE_MAX_TOTAL_LENGTH = 8192;
